name: Seiji Kameyama
description: {{Nihongo|'''Seiji Kameyama'''|亀山晴児|Kameyama Seiji|born on August 10, 1979}}, better known by his [[stage name]] '''Wise''', is a [[Japanese-American]] [[Japanese rap|rapper]] who raps in both [[English language|English]] and [[Japanese language|Japanese]]. His mother is [[Americans|American]] and his father is [[Japanese people|Japanese]] and during [[high school]], he lived in the [[United States]]. He is affiliated with the creative group Kazenohito. In 2005, he formed the group Wise'N'SonPub with beatmaker SonPub and the group [[Teriyaki Boyz]] with Ryo-Z, Ilmari (from [[Rip Slyme]]) and Verbal (from [[M-Flo]]). He made his major debut as a solo artist with the single "Shine Like A Star" on February 21, 2007.
